Text:
Emil, jeg mener bare godt, but...
Don't put out rar'd video-files. Nobody bothers to seed a (minisculy) huge file when it's just taking up space.
If you put up video files as video files and seed them (in one go - meaning, one torrent with 22 video files unrar'd and ready to watch) more people will seed as it will just lay there (being seeded) while they are watching the videos.
Men tusind tak for at du laver den her torrent! :)
Done seeding... uploadet X 7 and if nobody else vill seed the torrent is dead.
@PhiberOptix Movies are also as compressed as they can get already through codex, rar barely does anything.

No compression was used when i rar'd the files.
A recovery protocol was added though.
